author: Face the Nation
message: We're less than 5 hours away from the start of the first debate between JD Vance and Tim Walz! Here's what to know ahead of the debate: https://www.cbsnews.com/news/vp-debat...

author: Face the Nation
message: See behind the scenes of the VP debate at the CBS Broadcast Center in New York City: https://www.cbsnews.com/news/vp-debat...

author: Face the Nation
message: Meet the moderators for tonight's VP debate, Norah O'Donnell and Margaret Brennan: https://www.cbsnews.com/news/vp-debat...

author: Face the Nation
message: Sen. JD Vance and Gov. Tim Walz are meeting for the first and likely only VP debate before the general election. Here are live updates: https://www.cbsnews.com/live-updates/...

author: Face the Nation
message: The CBS News Confirmed team is fact checking the biggest claims made by Gov. Tim Walz and Sen. JD Vance in tonight's VP debate: https://www.cbsnews.com/news/fact-che...
